oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Innovationssystem ökologische Land- und Lebensmittelwirtschaft: Wo kann eine Interessenvertretung ansetzen?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Braun, Charis
Häring, Anna Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research communication and quality
Policy environments and social economy
Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The agro-food sector faces many challenges today. To cope with these, an effective innovation system is needed. This study’s goal is to analyse the organic agro-food sector’s innovative ability and innovation requirements. Another focus is on the status quo of the research relating to the organic agro-food sector and the overall framework for research funding. Finally, starting points for improving how the interests of the organic agro-food innovation system are represented in Germany are identified. This concerns the communication within the innovation system as well as the external communication with institutions and individuals that influence the overall conditions for research in this field.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Braun, Charis and Häring, Anna Maria (2014) Innovationssystem ökologische Land- und Lebensmittelwirtschaft: Wo kann eine Interessenvertretung ansetzen? Paper at: 13. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Hochschule für nachhaltige Entwicklung Eberswalde, 17. - 20. März 2015.
